text: Wintrust Arena at McCormick Square, also known as DePaul Arena or McCormick Place Events Center, is a 10,387-seat sports venue in Chicago's Near South Side community area that opened in 2017. It is the current home court for the men's and women's basketball teams of DePaul University. It is also an events center for McCormick Place. It also is the home of the Chicago Sky of the Women's National Basketball Association (WNBA). ==References== Category:2010s establishments in Illinois Category:2017 establishments in the United States Category:Sports buildings in Chicago Category:DePaul University
title: Wintrust Arena
